Jan 27 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:

  • AVEVA - ROHINTON MOBED, INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, WILL STEP DOWN FROM REMUNERATION COMMITTEE EFFECTIVE 27 JANUARY

  • AVEVA - AYESHA KHANNA, INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, WILL JOIN REMUNERATION COMMITTEE

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)
